projectList.name: Tokyo Train Delay
projectList.description: Web Application, Twitter bot and LINE bot providing train delay information in Tokyo. There was around 330 Twitter followers before service closed.

projectList.name: AI-House Automation
projectList.description: Automating dinner reservation process for AI-House HUB-4 student dormitory.

projectList.name: Naitei Journey
projectList.description: Job hunting management application that allows students to grasp job hunting status at a glance. User can add, edit, delete, and easily managing job application status in the form of a Kanban board-like style.

projectList.name: Online Othello
projectList.description: Online Othello game with lobby features. Players can create a room and invite their friends to play together.
